levels.description: Attack Range becomes global, and each heal is converted to a <@ba.vup>5</>- heal sequence that prioritizes different targets, each with <@ba.vup>{attack@heal_scale:0%}</> healing effectiveness and <$ba.dt.element>Elemental Injury</> recovery; the effect of the Second Talent is increased to <@ba.vup>{talent_scale}</> times
